description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国企业家、政治人物，中国共产党党员，现任齐星集团董事长，曾任第十一届全国人民代表大会湖北地区代表。
description.en: A Chinese entrepreneur and politician, a member of the Communist Party of China, the current chairman of Qixing Group, and a former deputy from the Hubei region to the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国省级行政区。
description.en: A provincial-level administrative division of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖北省下辖的地级市。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Hubei Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于亚洲东部的社会主义国家。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 由徐德担任董事长的企业。
description.en: An enterprise chaired by Xu De.

nodes.id: 第十一届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第十一届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第六届国家最高权力机关。
description.en: The 11th term of the highest state authority in the People's Republic of China.

en: Huazhong University of Science and Technology

description.zh-cn: 位于中国湖北省武汉市的综合性研究型大学。
description.en: A comprehensive research university located in Wuhan, Hubei, China.
Xu De is from Suizhou, Hubei.

description.zh-cn: 徐德是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Xu De is a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 徐德是齐星集团董事长。
description.en: Xu De is the chairman of Qixing Group.

relationships.target: 第十一届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 徐德自2008年起担任第十一届全国人民代表大会湖北地区代表。
description.en: Starting from 2008, Xu De served as a deputy from the Hubei region to the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 徐德毕业于华中科技大学经济法学专业。
description.en: Xu De graduated from Huazhong University of Science and Technology with a major in Economic Law.
